context.p: To use the SAN integration feature that Eucalyptus provides, configure supported SAN devices to allow Eucalyptus to manage the SAN. Eucalyptus automatically creates and tears down volumes, snapshots, and data connections from guest instances. The administrator does not need to pre-allocate volumes or LUNs for Eucalyptus.

Eucalyptus offers SAN support for EBS. The SANManager module directs the Storage Controller (SC) to manage supported SAN devices. Enabling the SANManager requires that you configure the CLOUD_OPTS variable in eucalyptus.conf so that Eucalyptus loads the SANManager module and selects your SAN device at start time.
